sourcerer.formatters module¶

class sourcerer.formatters.CallFormatter[source]¶

Bases: sourcerer.formatters.CallableFormatter

The formatter that should be used when calling functions

classmethod arg_names(property)[source]¶

Quote data in positional arguments so that it will be passed into a call

class sourcerer.formatters.CallableFormatter[source]¶

Bases: sourcerer.formatters.NameFormatter

This formatter should be used on callable objects like decorators and fuctions

classmethod arg_names(property)[source]¶

Abstract function for formatting positional arguments

classmethod kwarg_pairs(property)[source]¶

Abstract function for formatting keyword arguments

classmethod name(property)[source]¶

Replace all punctuation in a callables name with underscores

class sourcerer.formatters.Formatter[source]¶

Bases: object

Formatting operations for syntax objects

Name functions after the property they will be operating on. All function should take one argument of ‘property’.

classmethod apply(syntax_obj)[source]¶

Apply all formatters to the given object

This method will search the given syntax object for any property which has the same name as a formatter.

Parameters:syntax_obj (object) – The object with the attributes to be formatted
class sourcerer.formatters.NameFormatter[source]¶

Bases: sourcerer.formatters.Formatter

Base Formatter for object names like variables/functions/classes

class sourcerer.formatters.QuotedFormatter[source]¶

Bases: sourcerer.formatters.Formatter

Quotes the objects code in ‘single quotes’
